div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Type Code System

div.p: This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-patient-pay-type defines the following codes:

tr.td: Amount to be collected from a patient to be applied to a periodic deductible.
Amount to be collected from a patient to satisfy a per prescription coinsurance.
Amount to be collected from the patient to satisfy a per prescription copay.
Amount to be collected from the patient for sales tax.
Other amount to be collected from the patient
Amount equalling the total patient responsibility for a prescription product's cost.
